mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT cd.core_diameter_id, cd.core_diameter, cd.name, un.unit_id, un.name AS unit_name, un.abbr FROM borehole AS bh JOIN inventory_borehole AS ib ON ib.borehole_id = bh.borehole_id JOIN inventory AS iv ON iv.inventory_id = ib.inventory_id JOIN core_diameter AS cd ON cd.core_diameter_id = iv.core_diameter_id LEFT OUTER JOIN unit AS un ON un.unit_id = cd.unit_id WHERE bh.prospect_id = #{id}

SELECT bh.borehole_id, bh.name, ( SELECT ST_AsText(p.geom) FROM borehole_point AS bp JOIN point AS p ON p.point_id = bp.point_id WHERE bp.borehole_id = bh.borehole_id LIMIT 1 ) AS wkt FROM borehole AS bh WHERE bh.prospect_id = #{id}
